sections.heading: CreationSection 13-12-102 - SelectionSection 13-12-103 - Rules
sections.text:
There is created the Arkansas Foresters Hall of Fame to be housed in the Department of Forest Resources at the University of Arkansas at Monticello.Acts 1995, No. 111, § 1.

There is created the Arkansas Foresters Hall of Fame to be housed in the Department of Forest Resources at the University of Arkansas at Monticello.Acts 1995, No. 111, § 1.

Acts 1995, No. 111, § 1.

sections.heading: Selection
sections.text:
Persons to be inducted into the Arkansas Foresters Hall of Fame shall be selected by the Arkansas Division of the Society of American Foresters.Acts 1995, No. 111, § 1.

sections.heading: Rules
sections.text:
The Dean of the Department of Forest Resources at the University of Arkansas at Monticello shall promulgate such rules as are necessary to implement the provisions of this chapter.Amended by Act 2019, No. 315,§ 983, eff. 7/24/2019.Acts 1995, No. 111, § 1.
